conference.name: ML Summit 2024
conference.description: Machine Learning Summit focused on practical ML applications, MLOps, and real-world implementation strategies.

session.title: MLOps: Deploying Machine Learning Models to Production
session.speaker: Dr. Lisa Zhang
session.summary: This session provides a comprehensive guide to implementing MLOps practices for successful machine learning model deployment and management in production environments. Dr. Zhang covers the complete ML lifecycle from data ingestion and model training to deployment, monitoring, and maintenance. Key topics include automated model training pipelines, A/B testing for ML models, feature stores, and model versioning strategies. The presentation includes real-world case studies showing how organizations have successfully scaled ML operations, including challenges with data drift, model performance degradation, and continuous integration for ML workflows. Attendees will learn practical approaches to building reliable, scalable ML systems that deliver consistent business value.
